definition: to compose a preface (or introductory remarks, etc)/question (or section) order (on an exam paper)/question (or section) number
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to write the title of a book on a label
preface/foreword/preamble/recital (law)/also written 敘文|叙文[xu4 wen2]
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
notes on the use of a book/guide to the reader
verse form consisting of 8 lines of 7 syllables, with rhyme on alternate lines/abbr. to 七律
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
